hadith.text: Jabir bin 'Abdullah narrated that :The Messenger of Allah (ï·º) led his companions in offering the fear prayer. One group prayed with him while the other was facing the enemy. He led them in praying two rak'ahs, then they went and took the place of the others, and the others came and he led them in praying two rak'ahs, then he said the taslim
